#summary &map; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesM M] > &map;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Map;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2905/index.htm U+02905].
  * `&map;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21a6/index.htm U+021A6].
